newsitem.title: UK: INSIGHT-Cocoa seen moving lower but well supported.
newsitem.headline: INSIGHT-Cocoa seen moving lower but well supported.

text.p: JULY Close * Support * Resist * RSI14 * MA10 * MA30
Cocoa futures are expected to slide gently lower but the benchmark July contract still has good chart support at 1,020 stg and below, technical analysts said on Tuesday.
Traders called the market to open between five and six stg lower than Monday's close, after speculative liquidation and a perception of ample near-term supply drove New York to end sharply lower.
Although the London July contract touched a session low of 1,019 stg, analysts noted that a small upward trendline extending from a low of 981 stg was still intact and would be supportive.
A cluster of short-term moving averages arranged around 1,020 stg would also underpin prices, they said.

But some traders said London could still rack up further losses as speculators continued to liquidate long positions, with origin sellers waiting in the wings to cap any gains. --London Newsroom +44 171 542 8064
